message: I wonder if all those people screaming for our guns to be taken away, realize that is how Germany began to control their citizens. Taking away the guns is not the answer. We have gun rights so that what happened in Germany will not happen in the US. Do I believe that something needs to be done. Yes. Maybe if the government starting holding the families of these people responsible less of these shootings would happen. These deranged minded people did not just wake up one morning and decide they were going to go out and kill people. The families sit there and watch and know that these people are a danger and sit and do nothing about it.
